message: “They don’t think it’s happening in their own backyard and it’s happening in every community, in every city, and every town in America.”

data.description: PAW PAW, Mich. — At this year’s Paw Paw Wine Festival, a Michiana organization is partnering with one of the wineries to help survivors of human trafficking.Human trafficking is on the rise in Michigan. In 2
data.title: Human trafficking on the rise in Michiana; Local organization selling wine to help
